website_summaries.verdict: A great option for smaller babies who want to join the family for mealtimes, but require additional sitting support.
pros: Higher than average back and armrests
Foam insert creates a supportive cocoon for infants and is easily removed to accommodate growth
Compact design with convenient built-in storage for the detachable tray and securing straps
Suitable for use from 4 months to 4 years
cons: Low harness can be tricky to buckle and unbuckle

customer_reviews.title: Great seat!
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat!! Our daughter is only 3 months old but because of the higher back and with our supervision she has been able to strengthen her neck muscles since she isn't the biggest fan of tummy time!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This baby seat is great. I like that it comes with its own tray. My baby seems content enough to sit in it. It's well made and light to carry. My baby is already on the bigger side so he won't fit the insert for long. He still seems to enjoy the product and he seems safe enough in it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! Ordered it for my 4 month old daughter (13lbs) and she fits in it great! Didn't know we would all love it so much! It looks good and is super easy to clean! The tray stores away easy, as well as the straps, and it's lightweight for traveling. When strapped to a chair or sitting on the ground it is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie D

customer_reviews.title: The best infant/toddler seat
customer_reviews.text: If you’re like me, you’re comparing this to the Bumbo. This wins hands down. The removable liner makes it useful for a small infant to a toddler. The tray is great. Although there are Bumbos with trays, I love that this tray stores underneath the seat. And most of all, I like the straps that you can use to connect the seat to a regular chair to use as a makeshift high chair. This seat is very well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing delivered item
customer_reviews.text: This review is based on the poorly constructed one I was sent. So first it didn’t even come in the original box. At first sight it looked used. The tray appears to have some part missing. There is a small chunk of the cushioned seating missing and it doesn’t not fit together. Very disappointed because I really wanted it for my son.
customer_reviews.author: CaMisha Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but maybe not the best for bigger babies
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems fine, but our little guy is pretty big and it seemed like he would grow out of this pretty quickly (He was 18 lbs at 6 months). And since he has such a big head, it always seemed a bit unsteady when we had him in it on the floor. Maybe if you have a little baby it's a better fit? We ended up returning it since I didn't want to risk him growing out of it so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: Didn't have to buy a high chair!
customer_reviews.text: My children are grown and I finally had an adult living area. Along came my granddaughter! I dis not want any baby stuff cluttering up my new living area. Fortunately I found this gem. Fits nicely on my dining room chair, slides under table and matches my decor. It is sturdy and safe and I love that the tray slides into the seat. My daughter can easily take it to restaurants and the baby doesnt have to a sit in a used dirty restaurant high chair. Her legs fit snuggly and the back is nice and high so she has good posture when eating. So happy I didn't have to buy a high chair.
customer_reviews.author: DANIELLE ALVES

customer_reviews.title: Prefer this over other baby seats
customer_reviews.text: I love that the tray can be stored/hidden under the seat. We had a bumbo for my first son and putting the tray on and taking it off was a pain. We haven’t used it yet but it seems like it would be easy to clean- although not as easy as the bumbo bc it has more crevices but I bought this for the hidden tray feature and the long strap that can tie around a chair to make it more secure. The bumbo could only be used on sturdy surfaces like the floor or table top.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: A top buy if you are transitioning to toddler stage.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised how well built this seat is. -The are two straps that help with holding the seat in place. -Along with a back extension to help those kiddos who are still working on developing those back muscles. -The foam seat is soft and comfortable. There is also enough room to allow for growth and not be too tigh on their thighs. There is also a raised pillar between the legs to help them from being too hunched forward. Again this is great help for the kids who are just starting to hold themselves up. -Very easy to clean just lift up the foam seat to clean on the bottom and you're done. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Noe N.

customer_reviews.title: I have bought three of these so far...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one to use at my house - I'm the grandma - one for my daughter as a gift to use at her own house and we have been so pleased with them that I bought one for my niece as a baby shower gift. Great little baby seat with built in hidden storage for a feeding tray. Fits as baby gets too big for a bumbo seat. At our house we call it the "queen chair." Love this seat so much. You should know that the chair back comes stored underneath the seat and you need to turn it upside down to remove it so you can attach it up top where it belongs.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: We live in an apartment so our space is limited. This is a space saver as it can be placed on a chair. My daughter is 6 months and when I sit her in this chair she gets extremely excited. She loves sitting up and when I am in the kitchen I strap the seat to the chair and she is able to be by my side. She makes a mess with her homemade purée foods but I just pop the front table off and wash it in the sink. We purchased the gray color because the pink was not in stock. Super affordable. This is something we will keep as our family grows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and we love it. The stow away table is perfect
customer_reviews.text: How you can travel with a little one without this item is beyond me. Sure, there might be other baby/toddler seats, but this is all we know, and we love it. The stow away table is perfect. My son has one at Grandma-ma's (plane ride away) for when we are there, and we have one for local traveling, and visiting friends. You be surprised how often a travel booster seat comes in handy. It's clean because we clean it! Some of those restaurant high chairs can be suspect when it comes to cleanliness...
customer_reviews.author: Tim Mac

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars, nothing negative to say!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this since our baby was 4 months old. He LOVES this and it’s been so great to use for meal times since he also started solids a few weeks ago, super easy to wash and honestly, I’ve put it in the tub so he can sit unassisted and splash and it is just fine. Way better value than a bumbo since I know this will transition with him. It also deconstructs to become very short and we will take this when traveling for the holidays. Probably one of the better baby purchases made so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!  Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This little chair is sooo cool. I almost bought a bumbo but didn’t (thank goodness) because this chair is awesome! The tray ticks away under the seat when not in use and the chair itself has 2 different heights. When you first pull it from the box it looks short (like a shallow booster) but there is a high back that is under the seat that you can pull out and connect to the top of the booster to make it a full chair. My daughter loves this seat, it’s easy to clean too. We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Coad

customer_reviews.title: Great seat for toddles or younger in place of a high chair.
customer_reviews.text: Great for my two year grandson at his height and weight. Will also be good for my second grandchild as soon as the baby is ready to sit in a regular high chair. Connects securely to my chairs and the straps for the child are secure without being cumbersome. Much better and more secure than the older seats that attached to the table. Highly recommend either for occasional visits and sturdy enough for confident every day use.
customer_reviews.author: Fran G

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my second child because I couldn't find the Mamas and Papas seat for him that we have for big sister. I love that the tray can be stored in the base of seat but this item is difficult to use because the seat is really deep and its hard to get the seat belt clips on a wiggly little baby who ends up sitting on them. The clips are also for some reason hard to clip and unclip....just so frustrating when a flailing dirty toddler is done eating. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Walter R Montero

customer_reviews.title: Stable, mobile, and easy to clean - I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This seat is so great. My 4-month-old daughter isn't sitting on her own yet, but this is helping her develop her muscles. She can sit in it unaided, by propping her elbows on the sides. The seat is very easy to clean, which is important because she spits up a LOT. It is very stable and I use it on a variety of surfaces so she can watch me do what needs doing around the house. My only complaint is that the safety buckle in the front is very stiff and hard to undo. This makes it tempting to only use the tray to secure them, which the instructions tell you not to do.
customer_reviews.author: Elly

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect if you don’t have a lot of space
customer_reviews.text: I love that there’s a compartment in the bottom that holds the tray, BUT there’s also one that holds the straps that you’re not using. It’s super easy to clean. I bought this as a booster for my one year old and she’s a super messy eater, this seat is so easy to wipe down. I like how the insert can come out and it can grow with her. I wish I bought this sooner! It would’ve saved me from having so many headaches with the fisher price one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Mb

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at 3 months, still love at 16 months.
customer_reviews.text: Update: 3/4/2019 My daughter is now 16 months and we still love this thing. The pink insert comes out so she has plenty more room to grow. It cleans up easily and there is zero wear and tear even after using it 3 times a day for at least 8 months. I bought this for my 3 month old who is, per her doctor, very strong and stable for her age. She's very slim so we had to put a couple stuffed animals on either side of her to help with balance but other than that this is a great seat. It comes with straps so that it can be securely attached to whatever you put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not too sure on travel but a comfy chair
customer_reviews.text: This isn't that ideal for travel just because the seat doesn't collapse and it is kind of big but it is nice that the tray can be stored underneath and you can change the straps to strap to a chair, which is stored beneath the seat. Other than that I use this seat to help my little one sit upright and to eat at the dining room table when we cannot fit her high chair. Seat is soft, not styrofoam soft but a bit harder without it hurting my LOs behind.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Ann Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Super Multi-purpose Baby Seat!
customer_reviews.text: I got this seat for my granddaughter. She is beginning to sit up and I chose this because it looked like it would work to help her learn to sit up on her own and double as a feeding chair, with the added plus as serving as a booster seat when she gets older. It has been a perfect choice! I use it to give her "sitting time" when she tires of laying on the floor or bouncing in her jumperoo. I also use it as her "high chair". I love how the tray stows away in the bottom of the chair! Very well designed and made! I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No replacement straps.  Booo!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great travel booster feeding seat. The downside is if you need replacement straps, the manufacturer doesn’t have these. There are straps that detach and go in a compartment under the seat while not in use. These straps are used to secure the booster on the chair by strapping under the chair seat. We lost the straps somehow on vacation and couldn’t order replacement straps even with direct contact with manufacturer. We now have to use bungee cords as a hack that works.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: A must have! 5*****
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Well executed thoughtful concept and perfectly priced! An absolute winner! I changed my mind about purchasing nearly identical looking but twice as expensive Mamas&Papas booster in the last minute and have no regrets. Update: A year into use and it's still one of our best friends! It's comfortable and a perfect fit on ANY chair so far. We take it to restaurants and family gatherings, and it works well on the floor level too. Cannot be happier with this piece!
customer_reviews.author: Alpha WolframTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent chair
customer_reviews.text: Although my child does not like this yet, I like the fact that i can use it as a base for sitting, as well as a high chair. The tray slips into the bottom easily and does not cause problems, like the bottom of the tray pressing into a leather chair as it acts as the bottom, there is an actual bottom that keeps it flat. Attaches to a chair easily enough, although i wish the hooks that attached to the chair were more robust. The cushion portion is not so soft, but is easily removable for washing.
customer_reviews.author: L. McNerneyTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love tthis little seat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter. My daughter didn't think she needed it, but now uses it every day and loves it. It works on the couch, the table, the counter or any place flat. My granddaughter was 3 months old when I bought it and LOVED to be able to sit up like a big girl. Now that she is 5 months old, they use it to feed her. The tray slips right into the bottom of the chair when you aren't using it. It is very easy to fasten and unfasten. It is also very easy to clean. I would definitely recommend it for any little one.
customer_reviews.author: BJO

customer_reviews.title: Best baby purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We love this seat! We found that my baby's chunky thighs were not going to fit in a bumbo seat so we looked for other options. My son started using this at about 9mo and still uses it with the insert removed (he just turned 2). It comes with lots of different straps that store inside the unit for any kind of seat you may need to hook it to. We found it to be very sturdy and secure, easy to clean, and easy to get the tray on and off. I'm pregnant with my second I think we're going to forego the high chair and just use this when she's strong enough to sit up.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey H.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up! read instructions to get back piece out
customer_reviews.text: For the people that said the back support was missing, It’s Not: if u read the instruction manual it shows you just have to flip it over, slide out the tray and it’ll come out. They intelligently stored it underneath so that the box it ships in can be smaller. Good if you want your baby to learn to sit up, and not lean forward too much, the tray keeps them from doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Best item for child!
customer_reviews.text: My 16 month old didn't want to sit in her high chair any more and always loved to sit on the kitchen chairs. This was the perfect solution to still keep her safe and in contained and comfy seat. The seat straps on nicely and securely to any chair. the straps are adjustable for any size. the color is really pretty and matches my grey and white kitchen table and chairs. My daughter loves that her sippy cup has its own holder in the tray. Overall, very happy with this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Baila S.

customer_reviews.title: Seat is fine. Wrong color delivered.
customer_reviews.text: -I got the wrong color, which is mildly annoying. -I keep my house vacuumed all the time because my dog sheds and this is a dog hair magnet! I opened the box on the floor and it was covered in dog hair in no time. I had to give the thing a wipe down before I even used it. -My 7 month old is not contained enough in this thing. Even with the safety belts, she can twist and squirm way too much. The sides of this don’t come up very far on her. I think I’ll probably end up returning this.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Small for bigger babies
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -sturdy -holds well even to the cheapest chair -safe -place to gide the tray Cons: -the tray discolored after just first use ( we had mango) -I wish the middle lock could extend more for the bulky bottoms, I always struggle to get it out when I put baby in -small for bigger babies, I think mine will grow out of it pretty soon and she is only 7 months
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had it for the first kid
customer_reviews.text: Awesome on so many levels. The size is great, especially if you don’t have a lot of room to store baby gear, but that’s just one of the positives. It is the easiest thing to take apart and clean, the storage for the tray is awesome, the seat is very similar to the bumbo and fit my 3 month old perfectly without him flopping around, also fits my 4 year old if I remove the insert (for a size comparison), attaches to chairs easily, and if very well balanced if you just want to use it as a floor chair-no tipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Newhouse

customer_reviews.title: Paper stickers are the WORST. STOP.
customer_reviews.text: How is it 2019 and manufacturers are still putting paper stickers on their products? ONE STAR for all the picking, scratching and scrubbing I get to do over the next hour.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love the tray
customer_reviews.text: This has worked out very well. We use it for play time and meals. Baby can be in kitchen when I am cooking to watch and in living room floor to play with toys. We take it with us when visiting relatives and instand high chair. Love the tray, hide away when not needed and easily pulled out when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna L. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Best high chair replacement/ booster!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are using this Instead if a traditional high chair and it has served us so well. We actually have a nice high chair but this is just so much easier without taking up additional space. Our daughter uses this without the tray to sit at the table and eat with us. The straps work well and definitely should be used and the insert makes is work for really little ones but also allows it to grow with your kiddo.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Great seat, middle buckle is kinda annoying though
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat for my 4 month old to hang out in! Right now I just put a few suction toys on the tray and he loves playing with them. The only issues I have with this seat are that the middle buckle is sometimes hard to get at. Once we put him in the chair, 90% of the time he ends up sitting on the buckle so I have to dig it out from under him. Also if you happen to have long fingernails or even big hands its kinda hard to unbuckle.
customer_reviews.author: Sami Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good seat for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like this seat, but even though I ordered the "ultramarine" color, they sent me the red seat. I was a little disappointed but not enough to hassle with a return. I like that the back is high and supportive for my 4 month old who can't sit up on his own yet. I also love that the tray stores underneath the seat. However, it's a little hard to buckle & unbuckle the lap straps. The middle strap is right behind the "leg divider" so when he's sitting in the chair, it's hard to get your fingers between the baby & the rubber to clip or unclip the buckles.
customer_reviews.author: Molly G.

customer_reviews.title: Easily portable but carefull baby needs 100% supervision at all ...
customer_reviews.text: Easily portable but carefull baby needs 100% supervision at all times while on it, it tips over when baby rocks even on a flat surface especially when the tray is on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: The safety belt is sooooo short! Like whoa! My baby isn't chubby he's on the slimmer side ...but he feels too constricted. The seat itself is too snug for comfort and the belts are too short, hence tight. Returning
customer_reviews.author: Mr F

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly. My son is 4 months and he can sit but still tips forward when he reaches for his feet so this helps him to recover and sit back up. Since he's so young, I don't let him sit here for too long but since he will be eating from a spoon soon, I thought this would help him and he can grow into it. I love it for him. He's got some chubby thighs and still fits into this comfortably. The other foam seat by Bumbo squeezed around his thighs too much so I'm thankful for this one!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer12

customer_reviews.title: Best seat on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Like most mom is a registered for the Bumbo seat. I wish I had known about this first. This is so much better! The Bumbo pinches the babies legs and my baby is not very big. In this photo he is eight months 18 pounds. I love how it comes with its tray and the tray stores underneath the chair nicely. Heavy duty. Easy to clean. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sabarbs

customer_reviews.title: This seat is great! Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: This seat is great! Baby loves it! It's very light, convenient tray placement and has cute colors. I was thinking of getting the Bumbo but I read the great reviews for this. I also like how it can be used for bigger children. One thing about it I'm not a fan of is the crotch strap. It is too short and it always ends up under my son. I did solve that problem by taping it where it should be. Don't let that stop you from buying this seat!
customer_reviews.author: Maria H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this seat for Grandson! We considered Bumbo as w have used before. Glad we went with this. The tray easily cleaned and stores. Child is 4 months old and still needing support for sitting. This is great on the floor with or without tray. He is easily debited. Excellent for putting in the car for going out or visiting.
customer_reviews.author: Momasham

customer_reviews.title: Not all parts included in package.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 and both had the same part missing. The back piece that gives the extra length was not included in the boxes. I know that it was described as opened box but if all the parts are not included, that should be disclosed. I assumed that the reduced price was because it said opened box. I returned them both for refund.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again !
customer_reviews.text: So I bough this seat to have as a travel high chair to keep in the stow n go of my mini van witch it definitely will fit ! And come apart easily as well as assembles easily seems very easy to clean and able to attach to almost anything it has a very nice storage compartment on the very bottom for all your access straps witch is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kenzi falk

customer_reviews.title: One of the best things I bought as a new parent!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is amazing!!! I have gotten so many compliments and people wanting to know where I got it! It is so convenient and easy!! We even take it to restaurants to use instead of the high chairs there! Cause ya know... 99% of those are disgusting... and normally a lot larger than the child... unless your kid is already like 2 yr old! But if your like me and has a kid that likes to be alert and involved... leaving them in the car seat all the time just is not doable. So then use this!! And we use it at home too!! It’s awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Not a very good seatbelt.
customer_reviews.text: Strap broke right out of the box. Disappointed and a little irritated, obviously the security features (the seatbelt) isn't very sturdy. Item is easy to clean, and somewhat easy to travel with. My daughter likes it so hopefully we will be able to replace the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great seat! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Love,love, love this seat! We use it everyday for every meal. Love that the tray slides into the seat and there is storage on the bottom for the straps. Also love that it can grow with my little one. I do wish the tray was just a little larger but then it wouldn’t be so compact- which is great for travel. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cass1

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfy and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Straps up securely to our basic Ikea chairs! Easy to clean and the little one seems comfortable in it. Really secure and doesn't look like he would be able to shimmy his way out of it. I like the fact that you can hide the tray under the seat too. Tucks in really easy and contained.
customer_reviews.author: C Talulah Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great chair... For two months.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! My little man loves being a big boy sitting at the table with the family, instead of a high chair. Now for the bad- have had this chair (began using it the day we got it) and less than two months of having it and the center buckle has already cracked! So disappointed! We love this chair, but thought we would get more than two months of use out of it! Would love for the company to replace as I'm hoping that we just got a dud!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Dowd

customer_reviews.title: A seat that’s easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: We love this seat way better than our traditional stand alone high chair. It’s biggest attribute is that it wipes clean so easily! It is secured easily on one of our regular kitchen chairs and has a much smaller footprint than a traditional high chair. I love that the tray is easily stored under the seat. I would recommend this seat to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Ksbach1

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well for my infant grandson on his first visit when he was 6 months old. The liner kept him upright and happy. Later visit, when he was 11 months, the liner came out and he fit perfectly in the seat. The tie-down straps were adequately sized for various chairs we have in the house. Purchased one for my nephews' children as a result of experience with this one.
customer_reviews.author: K Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable highchair
customer_reviews.text: This has been a perfect highchair! We use it on our dining chair and on the floor while playing with our 5 month old. He seems well supported and comfy. I love the tray storage and it cleans up easily. It is a little awkward to carry as the handle seems like it is in an odd spot but not too big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Fitness girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby to eat at the table with us!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea that baby chairs were so expensive! So I was happy to find this highly rated chair. You can secure it onto a regular chair. I like how the foam insert is removable as baby grows, which we'll need to do soon. The food tray slides into the bottom when not in use which is super helpful We've had this for about six months now and it's one of the best purchases we've made as new parents.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Good lord this thing is awesome! We have an 11 month old and have been using this for 3 months. We wanted an alternative to the high chair while we are in the living room. We put the seat on our (very sturdy) coffee table so she can have breakfast while we are drinking our coffee and watching tv. It’s very easy to clean. The padding on the seats can be wiped down with Clorox wipes. They are removable as well which is a plus. The tray stores in the seat itself so it is easy to put away.
customer_reviews.author: sarabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Features
customer_reviews.text: Have had this chair for several months now. Our little guy out-grew the removable insert and now uses the main chair for eating. Love that we don't have to drag around a bulky high chair (especially with the new safety warnings and reported injuries from babies toppling them over). The safety straps work well, the removable tray is very easy to use and we use the red insert in the bathtub while he is working on fine-tuning his sitting. Great Value!
customer_reviews.author: breezenby

customer_reviews.title: One of the best baby purchases we made
customer_reviews.text: This little chair is my favorite thing for our 9 month old daughter. It is SO portable and SO easy to clean. We've taken it on multiple trips and to visit at other people's houses and she always has somewhere to sit and eat. I love that the tray slides into the seat for storage. We never used the soft insert because she is a big baby for her age (chubby thighs) but she fits perfectly in the seat without the insert, and still has room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chair! My baby is almost 3 months old, so she's technically too young, but she's always trying to sit up and look around so it works great with me next to her in case she crumples or tilts. She's about 23 inches long and 12 pounds (for reference on the photo). It's really light. The green part is relatively soft plastic and it is easy to put the tray on and off, or add the extra back. Plus it comes with straps to strap it to a regular chair around the back or the bottom. It's easy to wipe clean except there are nooks, crannies, and seams that could be a little harder to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: I have bought 3 of these now, they are great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third seat I have purchased, 2 for gifts and one for my home. I use it with my grand babies, it's easy to use, clean and I love that the tray slides in the base. This one I purchased for an incredible price, hope to see it at that price again so I can give more away.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat. It’s light weight and easy to take places if you need to. I love how you can store the tray away when not using it. Wish there was an option to attach an additional larger tray, as the tray it has is really small and not ideal for when baby is eating table food.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: ... me just start off by saying this is the BEST baby feeding chair ever
customer_reviews.text: Let me just start off by saying this is the BEST baby feeding chair ever. It is very lightweight but still so sturdy. It is very easy to connect to the chair and disconnect when you need to move it. The rubber seat can be easily removed and cleans so easy. I have not had any problems what so ever and plan to use it until my little guy grows out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Harding

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this baby chair is excellent. Quality, shape ( very nicely supports my baby's back), ease of cleaning and most of all the tray that you can stow away in the chair itself ! Only thing is if your baby is chunkier ( mine 21 lbs @ 8 months), you might have to remove the insert which to my mind did not affect the comfort and our girl was very happy and safe sitting in it.
customer_reviews.author: Rashmi

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Like other seats this one works well - pluses - comes with the tray - which saves $$$ compared to other seats the same price without the tray! Also, the tray stores better which competitor seats we used in the past did not! I also like this is more of a grow into seat with multiple options so it will last longer than the major competitor of baby seats!
customer_reviews.author: FickFam

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out design!
customer_reviews.text: Perfection! The little table fits in the bottom of the chair. The back comes off and fits up inside the chair. There’s a small storage in the bottom for the straps that go around a regular chair. So versatile! Soft foam seat and back. Light weight. Love this chair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Dearborn

customer_reviews.title: This seat is great. I like that the liner is removable to ...
customer_reviews.text: This seat is great. I like that the liner is removable to wash underneath. The tray stores beneath the unit when not in use. I like setting this up near our glass door so baby can watch "the weather channel" outside. The trays secures in the slots easily and there's a nice storage compartment for all the extra straps. We have tried attaching this to a chair and it took about 3 minutes. The chair isn't heavy, but does have enough "heft" to keep it solidly wherever you put it (keep in mind if you put it anywhere other than the ground, you need to strap it down).
customer_reviews.author: Anne S.

customer_reviews.title: food tray is very small
customer_reviews.text: Please make the food tray larger or at least make it flatter so bigger food trays can be set on it. I appreciate your effort to make it compact so it can be tucked underneath. It serves no purpose on its own, however, due to the small size.
customer_reviews.author: YOONSUN LIM

customer_reviews.title: Not enough slack on the belt buckle
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality materials, but major flaw in the waist Buckle, there is not enough Slack and I feel like it might be a little tight for my daughter, also because there's not enough wiggle room it's hard to clip the belt together with a moving baby in it. She outgrew it pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We got this one for our little one when she started sitting. However, the blue insert didn't last long (she grew out of it). The best part of this chair is that it is so easy to clean, and when they are little you can sit them on a table in it. Now that she is almost 9 months old, we need to get a formal high chair, but this was perfect before that.
customer_reviews.author: samh

customer_reviews.title: Handy little chair
customer_reviews.text: Overall works well. I like that it’s easy to transport and bring places. A pain to clean but that’s just the nature of these chairs. All the pieces come off and are easy to clean. I do with the tray was bigger. You have to put the food directly on it or the plate will spill. We’ve spilled many plates trying to balance them but luckily don’t use the tray very often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not comparable to the bumbo seat as they ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not comparable to the bumbo seat as they serve two different purposes. I thought I'd be able to use it with the insert to help my babies practice sitting up but it's too big and roomy to offer support. I'll have to wait until they are older to get use out of it. It's cute though. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda F.

customer_reviews.title: Great long term seat for baby!
customer_reviews.text: Originally I had bought the bumbo but my baby's legs were too chunky for that seat so we had to return it. I then found this and he fits perfectly. I like that you can remove the insert as they get older so it's a seat you will have for some time. He also just started on purees so I love the little tray this comes with. It's so easy to remove and wipe clean when he makes a mess.
customer_reviews.author: LifestylebyFrancesca

customer_reviews.title: Durable, space saver, easy to set up and clean!
customer_reviews.text: This baby seat is very easy to set up. You can put backrest and tray inside the seat. Also it has removable padding and it makes a lot easier when you want to clean. If you have an extra dining chair, this works perfect for you to save the space! My 8 months old loves sitting up in the seat. The four stars means I couldn’t tighten the bottom belt enough to the chair we have. It doesn't move because of a gripper on the bottom but I’m worried about safety.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Mostly well designed. A few changes should be made on version 3. The straps securing the bottom portion of the chair needs to be fixed on one side. I keep losing one end of it when I take it around. The thigh section is a bit snug for my 7 month old, he is in the 55th percentile so pretty average size i guess, but its quite snug. But overall this is a good chair.
customer_reviews.author: Don T

customer_reviews.title: Compact, easy to clean and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect chair that adapts to a child as they grow. After doing extensive research on the different styles of high chairs - this item made the most sense. It’s compact, easy to clean, and is able to travel effortlessly. The tray stores inside the chair When not in use on the bottom. The chair also transforms into a booster seat when your child gets bigger. And is able to strap on to a chair for safety. I’m impressed - the price was a selling point as well. I paid $44. Clean up was a breeze. I’d purchase this all over again!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works well. Easy to use. The only thing I don’t like is that the buckle in the seat isn’t very comfortable for my daughter. If she leans forward since it doesn’t have any padding I have to keep it loose so it doesn’t rub her belly wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Savanna

customer_reviews.title: Super good
customer_reviews.text: Oh this helped me so much because I would leave my son here and put him somewhere while I cook and did a bunch of stuff. I would put snack in his tray and toys. He love this seat ; was great for him to learn how to stand up firmly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful portable "highchair"!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this initially to help my baby sit up. It was okay for that, although it's a little bit big for smaller babies and doesn't offer the most support. BUT, it has been wonderful for feeding my baby now! It's so easy to move around if we need to take it to the grandparents. It's incredibly easy to clean, and the tray has no metal in it, so you can just stick it in the dishwasher without worrying about any parts rusting! The tray also fits underneath the seat, which is super handy, and it comes with straps so you can connect it to a normal dining chair! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Janae Nelson

customer_reviews.title: They work great for both and we love the versatility of using ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for our two kids - ages 7months and 21 months. They work great for both and we love the versatility of using them in a variety of locations. They are so easy to wipe down and store without a lot of extra junk. I'm positive we made the right purchase and will use these for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: J Thomp

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this little seat! Only draw back (and I think they fixed it) is when the baby outgrows the baby seat, there is no place to STORE the “rubber” seat cushion. There’s a place for the TOP but not the bottom. The TRAY is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great chair! Compact storage
customer_reviews.text: This thing is genius. The tray stores underneath so it doesn't take up more room. The padded seat can be removed and it becomes a booster. This is the only high chair we use. It doesn't have enough support for a really little baby, but has held my son since he could sit up on his own at 4 months. It's nice not having a huge highchair to store or move. It fits in any chair or we put it right on the table while we feed him. He's almost 1 year old and still loving his chair. Bonus, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: kaitlin bisel

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: We love this seat! It's perfect to sit on top of our counter or on the floor in the kitchen. Our baby loves to sit in it. And it can easily be wiped down and cleaned. I love the feature that the tray can be stowed underneath the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Blake and Emma Tubbs

customer_reviews.title: A great seat for young guests or travel but not the best for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this seat several months ago for our 6-month-old baby as our 2-year-old was transitioning out of a larger high chair. It has a compact design and the tray can be stored under the seat. The surfaces clean very easily but the tray cannot be removed one handed making it sometimes difficult to get a child seated. Therefore, it works well as a chair to travel with or to keep on hand for young guests.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Matherne

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and overall good
customer_reviews.text: This chair has helped my son enjoy mealtime more. His high chair was too roomy and he seemed to feel unsupported. This booster offers lots of support and stability and he is eating a lot better and stays seated much longer than before. With the insert it is a little annoying to clean but that would be my only complaint. Great booster especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Notaregularmom,acoolmom;)

customer_reviews.title: 2-year-old fits well
customer_reviews.text: This is such a handy little chair. It was always a bit of a pain bringing our toddler's high chair to family dinners because it's so big. This is very portable and our 2-year-old fits in the chair perfectly without the insert. We also have a 3-month-old so I can't wait to use it with him too!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: This is a necessity!
customer_reviews.text: I was torn between the bumbo and this and got this for the reason that it could grow with my baby. I’m so happy with my decision! She loves sitting in this and now can participate in dinner time with us. The removable tray is super convenient. We take this everywhere. This is a necessity for us!
customer_reviews.author: Noelani Soroten

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite baby items!
customer_reviews.text: So cute and so handy! We use it for play, eating anywhere in the house (including TV dinner in bed if lazy lol). Very Portable and fits resturant chairs well. We always have a seat that is clean that our baby fits in!
customer_reviews.author: Greykatbird

customer_reviews.title: Color not even close to the picture but this will do.
customer_reviews.text: Had one like this for my oldest son, we moved and it was left behind at the in laws house so we had to buy another one for my youngest. It said poppy red, it looked like a nice red but when we got it it looks a bit pink. Kind of like starburst red if you can imagine it. Other than that we love it for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Vang

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes it, happy parents.  Stable, contrary to some reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing, I was debating between the Bumbo and this one. I ended up with this one as it could accommodate my little girl's chubby legs. The reviews had me worried that it was unstable after removing the tray. Not sure if they improved the design on the one I got vs. the other reviews (or user error), but after removing the tray, there is an additional plastic flap that stabilizes the chair that you flip out after the tray is removed (you can see the little flap on the bottom middle in the product picture). No more balance issues. The only gripe I have is about the straps. The center strap is very difficult to access and use.
customer_reviews.author: Average User

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price very sturdy for baby
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy nice tray seat my lil mama is chunky going on 4 months she still has good room to grown into chair with pad fitting on it then I see we will be able to use as toddler seat as she gets bigger/older this has already paid for itself and compared to gumbo price which I feel us expensive this product totally as described fast delivery feels really safe for my lo to continue strengthening her back and neck
customer_reviews.author: Goodsno1g

customer_reviews.title: ... a full sized high chair but the tray is pretty small. With a new eater
customer_reviews.text: We were hoping to use this in place of a full sized high chair but the tray is pretty small. With a new eater, most of the food ended up on the floor and in the dog's belly. It is very easy to clean and works perfectly as a back up seat for travel. We ended up getting the Ingenuity Smartclean Trio high chair for home and absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 month old, she has been sitting in it for 5 month. I have a big Island and either next to me when I cook. I dunno what I would do without this little chair. I love it! She loves it! I highly recommend(trust me this is my third baby)
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: We use this instead of a high chair in our small dining room. The no slide base makes it perfect for the dining room chair. The tray stores in the seat (why I bought it) so we can easily pack it when we visit friends
customer_reviews.author: SewCutebynichole

customer_reviews.title: Had help with getting this in the color I wanted in the time frame I needed it and was very happy with both product and assist from Amazon in sorting ...
customer_reviews.text: This works well. Gift for my daughter helpful and with proper fastening safe for active grandson to have his own clean surface to eat on. Had help with getting this in the color I wanted in the time frame I needed it and was very happy with both product and assist from Amazon in sorting the order.
customer_reviews.author: Luanna

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product, a much better design than the bumbo. The teal color is very nice. I love that the tray stores underneath it and that it doubles as a booster chair. It's worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: ETop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great little idea for travel or for grandma's house!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My granddaughter is just turning 6 months old and she really likes being in it! Easily transported and attached to a kitchen chair properly seems quite safe. Used with supervision always! It also helps eliminate some of the clutter of having little ones around!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Massey

customer_reviews.title: I really like that I can put this seat just about anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I really like that I can put this seat just about anywhere. It works for playing with toys and I am sure once we get to eating foods, it will be great for that too. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because my son gets frustrated because he doesn't have a lot of wiggle room to adjust his position, but that could just be a personal issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brittaney

customer_reviews.title: After reading both reviews I found this a better deal and I was so happy with my decision
customer_reviews.text: I was in doubt about getting this one or the other brand (bumbo). After reading both reviews I found this a better deal and I was so happy with my decision. It is so versitile and you can adjust and set it up for different uses and your baby size. You can’t go wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect from 5 months to young toddler
customer_reviews.text: After looking at other "starter" seats, I ordered this one because of the removable insert and simple design. With the insert, it was supportive as our little one learned to sit up. He is now a (big) 12 month old and still fits easily in the seat without the insert. This has been the perfect choice for his first year. The seat has been used in a chair, on the floor, on the table top, at home, at grandparents and at restaurants. It's also super easy to wipe clean. We're very happy with this little seat!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome device. My daughter loves sitting in it and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome device. My daughter loves sitting in it and her chunky thighs fit in it as well. I gave 3 stars because the way your baby sits in it is not healthy for their hips. We only allow her to be in it for feedings then quickly out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Bevin Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little seat for a baby
customer_reviews.text: Great first seat for our daughter. She's been in it for about a month now (5 months old) and certainly makes feeding her regular food a lot easier. It's also very comforting knowing she's strapped down in the seat so she wont fall out. Also really nice to just sit her in there with a toy while we do dishes or what ever so she can watch and be involved. The tray stashes in the seat too which is very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: James Slack

customer_reviews.title: Buckle gets stuck...
customer_reviews.text: Regret this purchase. I thought it would be great but the buckle to buckle them in got stuck every single time I used it. Then when I tried to press harder, it would end up pinching my fingers. Also the tray doesn't go in far enough if you are using it on a petite baby. I am returning it. Definitely disappointed considering most of the ratings are good.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

product_meta.title: Ingenuity Baby Base 2-in-1 Seat - Peacock Blue
product_meta.description: Color:Peacock Blue - ClassicSitting up means baby can engage more in playtime, join you at the dinner table, and take in a whole new view of the world. Baby Base 2-in-1 does just that. It provides the support that allows babies to sit up. With 2 modes of use, Baby Base 2-in-1 is designed for use on the floor, or it can attach safely to a dining chair for use as a booster seat - making it perfect for playtime, dinner or travel. There is a 3-point harness for safety. Baby Base 2-in-1 comes with its own tray that conveniently stores beneath the seat for easy storage and transport, so you won't lose it or have separate pieces to keep up with. The foam insert provides extra cushioning for baby and can be removed so the seat will remain comfortable as baby gets bigger. Multiple colors to choose from. Designed with parenthood in mind.
feature_bullets: For those “sorry, we don’t have high chairs” moments: Baby Base 2-in-1 Seat

It’s a woe for every new parent: You’ve finally geared yourself up for a meal out with your baby...only to be thwarted by a restaurant that doesn’t have child seats. No, you shouldn’t head home! Just come prepared with one of your own

We love the Baby Base 2-in-1 seat because it’s compact enough to keep in the trunk of your car and safely attaches to a dining chair for meals anywhere. The foam insert provides extra cushioning for smaller babies and can be removed as your child grows for years of use
Pro tip: The removable tray stores under the seat so it’s less likely to get lost in transport
Minimum Age-4 Months. Maximum Age-48 Months

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,956 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
